sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-app-bar app color="teal" flat>
      <v-app-bar-nav-icon @click="drawer = true"></v-app-bar-nav-icon>
    </v-app-bar>
    <v-navigation-drawer v-model="drawer" absolute temporary>
      <v-list nav dense>
        <v-list-item-group
          v-model="group"
        >
          <v-list-item class="teal lighten-4">
            <v-list-item-icon>
              <v-icon>mdi-table-edit</v-icon>
            </v-list-item-icon>
            <v-list-item-title @click="setEditMode">
              <template v-if="isEditMode">Save Page Layout</template>
              <template v-else>Edit Page Layout</template>
            </v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item>
          <v-divider dark></v-divider>
          <v-list-item class="teal lighten-4">
            <v-list-item-icon>
              <v-icon>mdi-checkerboard</v-icon>
            </v-list-item-icon>
            <v-list-item-title @click="setEditMode">
              Edit Page Theme
            </v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item>
           <v-divider dark></v-divider>
        </v-list-item-group>
      </v-list>
    </v-navigation-drawer>
    <v-main>
      <Layout />
    </v-main>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script lang="ts">
import Vue from "vue";
import Layout from "./components/layouts/Layout.vue";

export default Vue.extend({
  name: "App",

  components: {
    Layout
  },

  data: () => ({
    drawer: false,
    group: null,
    }),

    methods: {
        setEditMode() {
            this.$store.commit('changeState');
            this.drawer = !this.drawer;
        }
    },

    computed: {
        isEditMode() {
            return this.$store.state.isEditMode;
        }
    }
});
</script>
